TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 为 WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件提供数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于事件为提供的值**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件并使您能够指定为当前请求的自定义 Windows 标识。The class is used to supply event values to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request. 构造对象使用提供的 IIS 和当前的 Windows 标识和将其传递给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 你可以使用属性对象提供给**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前向自定义对象。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未指定的值期间属性**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，Windows IIS 提供的标识用作当前请求的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则属性设置为返回的标识方法。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the property is set to the identity returned by the method. **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**引发事件时，才身份验证设置为和是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块。The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前向自定义对象。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来设置属性的当前向自定义对象。You can use the property to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未指定的值期间属性**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，Windows IIS 提供的标识用作当前请求的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request. 如果 IIS 使用匿名身份验证，则属性设置为返回的标识方法。If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the property is set to the identity returned by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前向自定义对象。The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object.
